node.title: 1.N
node.body:
As the morning sun pries you from your slumber, you lie in bed a while,letting the light of a new day wash over you.
[[2.N]]

node.title: 2.N
node.body:
From downstairs you hear the sound of your parents speaking in hushed voices and while you're not sure what they're saying you have a strong sense that it can't be good. Looking around your room you see your brother's bed is empty. [i]Strange[/i], you think, as you ponder the empty matress. [i]Since when did Kasta rise early?[/i]
[[3.N]]

node.title: Key
node.body: N = Narration O = Option S = Speech SS= Speech Selection

node.title: 3.N
node.body:
You dress and as you head downstairs your parents suddenly stop talking altogether. They turn to look at you and you can't help but notice that their smiles look a little forced.
[[4. O]]

node.title: 8.S
node.body: Mother: Hey! Someone's up early! Did you sleep okay?

node.title: 9.N
node.body: In a moment, your parents smiles are gone. They look worried, more worried than you've ever seen them.

node.title: 10.S
node.body: Mother: On a plate up at the castle I imagine. Get your own breakfast lazy!
